mapper.select:
SELECT o.*
FROM IsuWorkflow o
WHERE o.orgId=#{orgId} AND o.deleted != TRUE AND o.disabled != TRUE ORDER BY o.createTime ASC
mapper.insert: insert into IsuWorkflow (name, descr, orgId, defaultVal, buildIn, deleted, disabled, createTime) values (#{name}, #{descr}, #{orgId}, #{defaultVal}, #{buildIn}, FALSE, FALSE, NOW())
mapper.select:
SELECT o.* FROM IsuStatus o JOIN IsuWorkflowStatusRelation r ON o.id=r.statusId
WHERE r.workflowId = #{id} AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true
